Better Enums

Fast, intuitive enums for C++

Open-source under the BSD license

Performance

This is a placeholder page — the only testing done so far shows that compiling a large (30+) enums on clang is faster than merely including iostream. More conclusive information coming today or in a few days! For the clang test, compilation of all those Better Enums takes about 60% of the time that processing iostream does.
